Summary: 2 extremely large circles of light in sky not moving in nj
divs: sighting detailsi was driving in my car n saw to my above right, 2 very large circular yellowish\whitelights. they looked like car headlights but in the sky high above the tall trees but lower then all the plane activity i noticed after. 1plane was that big gray dull lookn military plane with no writing on it. anyway i had to make a left turn which made the 2lights now behind me n hard to see. however i immediately called my friend wrkn at a gas station that faces where i saw the lights. by the way, when i saw the lights they were stationary in the sky. i asked my buddy if he was seeing it. he claimed he saw the larger then normal lights stationary, then begin to move, then stop instantly. he then simply said he couldn't see it anymore. following this there was a lot of human made lights or sports aerial activity.
